|stockos = Î¼Clinux;2.4.26-uc0;; |exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, (38400 8N1),, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = boot log |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = linksys |defaultssid_regex = ^linksys$ |default_ch = |manuf = Askey |manuf_model = RT3105W |manuf_rev = -D40 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/12/2005 |estreldate = 03/2005 |estprice = |upc = 745883562831 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0006ZM4XK |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Airgo AGN1223AR-03 |rad1modif = Mini PCI (long) |rad1chip1 = Airgo;AGN103BB; |rad1chip2 = Airgo;AGN100RF; |rad1chip3 = Airgo;AGN100RF; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 108 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM '''Askey''' RT3105W, like the WRT54GX2 "RTA3105W", "28-000311", "REV:1.1", "2/18/2005", and "3028-001751" is silkscreened on the main board. :A sticker with "RT3105W-D40", "6156A022587 F06" is printed on a label affixed to the top of the board (along with two separate MAC labels). :"3017-004541" and "17-000861" is silkscreened on the wireless module. ==Links of Interest== [http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/linksys/wrt54gx On the OpenWrt wiki] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The serial header is the (populated) '''JP1'''. 
JP1 [ (RxD) (TxD) (GND) (...) ]

  |
  |
  |
  v

to RTL8651B
{{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
